description: This course is meant as a follow up or complement to your prior PHP learning. You should know the basics of PHP and SQL or be in the process of learning how to use PHP with a database. It assumes you are familiar with the basic syntax of PHP, variables, functions, conditional structures etc. and how to create tables, insert, delete, and update records via SQL (Structured Query Language) in a MySQL database server via PHP.
title: Create a User Registration System with PHP and MySQLi
